title: Ask This Spring - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Beautiful Female Lead   Familial Love   Family   Family Business   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Generals   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Medical Knowledge   Military   Obsessive Love   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 石上清泉
description:
Zhuo Lian, a brewmaster in the People’s Republic of China, crosses over into the storybook. According to the original plot, she will do all the evil things and end up with a miserable death.

In order to survive, she takes great pains and cares for the future Duke of Zhen. Oh but, why does he look at her more and more strangely?>
